title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 540.1 - Filing of annual reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 540.1 - Filing of annual reports

State Regulations

Each municipal water system is hereby directed to file, in
accordance with the requirements of section
3.5
of this Title, to the
commission the annual report of its division, bureau or department of water, within two months succeeding the close of its fiscal year, commencing with that
for 1931. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
540.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
